Posts.Content: Mar 23, 2008 11:02PM - edited Mar 23, 2008 11:04PM by beenthere Yes, I had it and used aloe plant gel available at health food stores in the refrigerator section: 1 TBL each day. Helps the burned esopahagus and nausea. Would also recommend Willow Tea. You can simply find a tree, clean a branch and boil the leaves, makes a large quantity and you can keep it in the refrigerator for daily use during treatment. Willow leaves can also be frozen when fall is approaching for winter brew needs.
